trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Though the relay bears no visible signs of damage, it does not appear to be functioning at the moment...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_002<tab>(-Krile-)This is Krile. Call it an educated guess, but I thought you might have arrived at Aethernet Control by now. If so, how does it look?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_003<tab>(-Krile-)...Well, at least it wasn't smashed to pieces. If your assessment is correct, we may be able to reintegrate it into the Aethernet.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_004<tab>(-Krile-)This may not sound like the most elegant solution, but sixty percent of the time it works every time. Right─we're going to flood the relay with a massive amount of aether to “wake” it up, as it were.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_005<tab>(-Krile-)To that end, we're going to need to amass a substantial quantity of Anemos crystals. Ninety-nine crystals, assuming my calculations are correct.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_006<tab>(-Krile-)I know it's a lot to ask, but I believe this is our best bet. Once you have them, bring them to Aethernet Control and I'll walk you through the process.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>To flood the Aethernet relay and continue the Eureka expedition, you will need to procure ninety-nine Anemos crystals. Please note that these crystals will be consumed in the process.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_100_011<tab>Use the ninety-nine Anemos crystals to flood the relay with aether?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_010<tab>(-Krile-)This is it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Are you ready?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_011<tab>(-Krile-)Rechecking measurements... Right. Listen carefully. To flood the relay with aether, we will need to repurpose your magia board as an elemental converter...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAPERSON_000_100<tab>Seekest thou...power? Power to smite thine enemies? To cast down the wicked and raise up the righteous?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_A1_000_001<tab>All that and more...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_A1_000_002<tab>...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAPERSON_000_110<tab>A warrior, then! Coveter of strength! Blessed art thou, arbiter of vengeance!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAPERSON_000_120<tab>Art thou a pawn, then!? Content to surrender to the whim of fate─ to bid welcome to the wicked and the dark!?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAPERSON_000_130<tab>And within...within... A light burning, radiant, resplendent!

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAPERSON_000_131<tab>Lo, in light <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> walketh...and in light <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> abideth. Thus will I remember thee.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_200<tab>...There is no other way.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_201<tab>Aye. Even if we fought the damned thing to our dying breaths, it'd endure. It's as though it has a nigh-bottomless wellspring of aether to draw upon...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_202<tab>Until such time as a permanent solution is found, it shall be sealed away. If any among you yet harbor doubts, speak them now.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_203<tab>You'll hear none from me. Let's do it and be done with it.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_204<tab>Right, then. The matter of what to do may have been resolved, but we've still the matter of where to do it.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_205<tab>Not in the colony. That much is plain. The location must be remote─far from prying eyes and covetous men.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_206<tab>Well, Galuf? This was your idea. Got any suggestions?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_207<tab>(-Galuf-)As a matter of fact, I do. An island not far from the motherland. Deserted. Dangerous. The perfect place to build a prison...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_021<tab>(-Krile-)...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? What happened? Please respond.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_022<tab>(-Krile-)Worked, did it? Glad to hear it. Our readings suggested as much, but I wanted your confirmation before I performed the final test...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_023<tab>Well! I appear to have arrived with all my bits intact. I believe that constitutes a success. Very good. I'll have to perform various adjustments and measurements before we can risk teleportation to other regions, but this is nevertheless a significant accomplishment.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_024<tab>By the way, you took an awfully long time to respond after initiating the process. Did something happen?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_025<tab>Galuf!? You're certain that's the name you heard spoken in the vision?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_026<tab>Four men, one of them a Lupin. And this masked man you met. If they were Grandfather's... Then would that make him...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_KRILE_000_027<tab>Ah, forgive me. Neither the time nor the place. Let us return to Port Surgate.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Though the Aethernet relay appears to be fully operational at a glance, you recall Krile saying that it would require further adjustments before travel to other regions would be possible...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The Aethernet relay appears to be functioning somewhat more efficiently than before, likely due to Krile's adjustments. Travel to other regions should no longer pose significant risk.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTBREAKTERMINAL_00457_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>To continue the expedition elsewhere, you must depart <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022C /var> and speak with Rodney at Pier #1 in Kugane.
